## `GetMinimumDownloadFileSizeInKilobytes`

Returns whether files being downloaded\index{web harvester!settings} will replace existing ones.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
number GetMinimumDownloadFileSizeInKilobytes()
```


### Return value {-}

Type: `number`
